Name: Activation Rate
Definition: % of new signups who create at least 1 child profile + 1 goal within 24h

Name: D7 Retention
Definition: % of users active on Day 7 after signup

Name: Goal Completion Rate
Definition: % of goals created that reach 100% funding

Name: Task Completion Velocity
Definition: Avg tasks completed per active child per week

Name: Parent Approval Time
Definition: Avg time between task_completed and task_approved

Name: Cash Usage Rate
Definition: % of total transaction volume that is flagged as 'Cash Entry'

Name: Pro Mode Adoption
Definition: % of eligible children (11-14) who opt-in to Pro Mode

Name: Churn Rate
Definition: % of paying families (if applicable) who cancel subscription
